title: 翻译求解
author: Aikini
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Aikini 于 2019-8-21 21:08 编辑 
Fixed tomes being enchantable when having a stacksize > 1.
Added a replacement for the normal Wandering Trader spawner.  This new spawner is capable of spawning on snow and other locations that would previously not be valid spawn locations.
The new spawner also changes how often a trader spawns with regards to chance:

Vanilla Spawner:
There is a 25% chance to roll a 10% chance to try to find a location to spawn a trader per day.  The roll chance increases each day a player is logged in by 25%/day, up to 75%.

Apotheosis Spawner:
There is a 10% chance to try to find a location to spawn a trader per day.  The roll chance increases by 10% each day, up to 100%.我找不到那个替代流浪商人的东西，而且我看着看着已经分不清spawner是什么了
以及这里的roll是什么意思，我不是很理解
这是Apotheosis的更新，第一段我看得懂，第三段就开始陷入懵逼状态了

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
spawner这里也许是生成器(生成机制)?
the roll change increases by 10% each day应该是每天概率提升上下抖动10%，今天8%明天12%

replies.author: 稗田讚歌
replies.txt_content:
根据翻译，我的理解应该是每日在玩家周围附近的刷新概率叠加提高。
Vanilla Spawner的概率最高为75%，每日登录提高25%（三日达到峰值不再提高，直至刷新在玩家附近后重新开始计算。）
Apotheosis Spawner的概率最高为100%，每日提高10%（十日达到峰值必定会刷新在玩家附近。）
